app.title: AugmentCode-Free
app.description: AugmentCode-Free is an open-source and free IDE maintenance tool.
app.feature_list:
‚Ä¢ Clean IDE Database
‚Ä¢ Modify Telemetry IDs
‚Ä¢ One-click Modify All
app.opensource_notice: This project is completely open source and free!
app.warning_notice:

This project is completely open source and free! If someone charges you, please contact the seller immediately for a refund and report the fraud.
app.dont_show_again: Don't show this dialog on startup

messages.close_warning:
‚Ä¢ Please save any unsaved content first
‚Ä¢ Backup important chat records in {ide_name}

Confirm everything is ready before closing {ide_name}.

Continue to close {ide_name}?
messages.run_all_warning:
This will close {ide_name} and clear Augment chat data!

Please ensure:
‚Ä¢ Files are saved
‚Ä¢ Important chat records in {ide_name} are backed up

Continue with modification?
messages.clean_db_warning:
This will clean {ide_name} database entries containing keyword '{keyword}'.

Please ensure:
‚Ä¢ {ide_name} is closed
‚Ä¢ Important data is backed up

Continue cleaning database?
messages.modify_ids_warning:
This will modify {ide_name} telemetry IDs.

Please ensure:
‚Ä¢ {ide_name} is closed
‚Ä¢ Important data is backed up

Continue modifying telemetry IDs?
messages.ide_running_warning:
Detected {ide_name} is running!

Please close {ide_name} before proceeding.
You can click "Close Selected IDE" button.
messages.welcome_message:
Welcome to AugmentCode-Free!

This is an open source and free IDE maintenance tool that supports VS Code, Cursor, and Windsurf.

Please select your preferred language:
messages.first_run_warning:
‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice:

This project is completely open source and free!
If someone charges you, please contact the seller for a refund immediately and report the fraud.

Project URL: https://github.com/BasicProtein/AugmentCode-Free
messages.jetbrains_db_notice:
{ide_name} products do not require database cleaning.

Please use "Modify IDE Telemetry ID" function to modify SessionID.

console.gui_tip: üí° Tip: If the interface doesn't appear, check if firewall or security software is blocking
console.install_deps: 1. Ensure all dependencies are installed: pip install -r requirements.txt
console.check_python: 2. Ensure Python version is 3.7 or higher
console.check_files: 3. Ensure all project files are in the same directory
console.submit_issue: 4. For other issues, please submit an issue

cli.description: AugmentCode-Free: Multi-IDE Maintenance Tools. Provides utilities for cleaning IDE databases and modifying telemetry IDs. Supports VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and JetBrains.
cli.clean_db_help: Cleans the specified IDE's state database by removing entries matching the keyword.
cli.modify_ids_help: Modifies the specified IDE's telemetry IDs (machineId, devDeviceId) in storage.json.
cli.run_all_help: Runs all available tools for the specified IDE: clean-db and then modify-ids.
cli.ide_option_help: IDE to process (vscode, cursor, windsurf, jetbrains)
cli.keyword_option_help: Keyword to search for and remove from the database (case-insensitive).
cli.errors: Process reported errors. Check previous messages.
cli.proceeding: Proceeding to the next step despite the error.
cli.all_finished: All tools for {ide_name} have finished their execution sequence.
cli.unsupported_ide: Unsupported IDE: {ide}. Supported: vscode, cursor, windsurf, jetbrains

modify_ids.failed: Telemetry ID modification process reported errors. Check previous messages.
modify_ids.error: Error occurred while modifying telemetry IDs: {error}

run_all.starting: Starting to execute all tools for {ide_name}
run_all.all_completed: All tools for {ide_name} have completed their execution sequence.
run_all.partial_failed: Some tools for {ide_name} failed to execute.
run_all.error: Error occurred while running all tools: {error}

process_manager.partial_killed: Some processes may not have been terminated

patch.completed: Patch operation completed! Successfully processed {success}/{total} files
patch.restore_completed: Restore operation completed! Successfully restored {success}/{total} files
patch.restore_no_success: No files needed restoration or restoration failed
patch.scanning: üîç Starting to scan extension files for all IDEs...
patch.batch_completed: Batch patch completed! Successfully processed {count} IDEs
patch.batch_partial: Batch patch partially successful, check detailed results

errors.readonly_file:
File write failed: Target file is in read-only mode
File path: {file_path}
Solution:
1. Find the file in File Explorer
2. Right-click the file and select 'Properties'
3. Uncheck the 'Read-only' option
4. Click 'OK' to save settings
5. Re-run the patch operation
Original error: {original_error}
errors.write_failed:
File write failed: {original_error}
Please check if the file is being used by other programs or permission settings
